title: Baking Powder
description: Cooking with baking soda (Natron) is pretty rare in Germany, though you will be able to find some pretty easily in most stores, packaged in the small packets baking powder also comes in.

children.value: Cooking with baking soda (Natron) is pretty rare in Germany, though you will be able to find some pretty easily in most stores, packaged in the small packets baking powder also comes in.
